tasks.task: Building a rainwater collection system
subtasks: Attaching gutter devices to direct water flow
Painting PVC pipe for durability and UV protection
Using adapters to create a choke point for float ball activation
Installing a float ball to shutoff dirty water runoff
Adding a clean-out valve for system maintenance
Filtering water using screens and traps to remove debris
Painting the water tote for UV protection and algae prevention
Securing the tote with a strong foundation and proper leveling
Attaching adapter to convert non-standard tote threads to standard pipe thread
Installing filters to pre-clean water before entering the main filtration system
